0.3.name: wordpress/phiwarevoice
0.3.description: Phiware Voice service has the objective to offer automatic, natural text to speech conversion, as a service over the web, using synthetic voices (TTS - Text-to-Speech). At present, we offer a service that generates the audio version of your web site's pages, improving their accessibility and helping people who may have difficulty in reading the contents by themselves, or who simply prefer listening.
